content: a cast on method of your choice for repeat from * to * three more times k to end of instance the twisted german cast on and skip round 8 sts decrease d the above steps going straight to joining in the work the decreases as follows round decrease round followed by 6 even rnds 88 sts left join in the round making sure not to twist the decrease round followed by 6 even rnds 80 sts left sts place the bor marker to mark beg of round join decrease round followed by 5 even rnds 72 sts left and work in the round decrease round followed by 5 even rnds 64 sts left work ribbing as follows decrease round followed by 4 even rnds 56 sts left ribbing * k1 p1 * repeat from * to * to end of round decrease round followed by 4 even rnds 48 sts left work ribbing for 7 cm 2 7 from co edge decrease round followed by 3 even rnds 40 sts left make the fold optional work 2 rnds of slipped decrease round followed by 3 even rnds 32 sts left stitches for the fold line as follows decrease round followed by 2 even rnds 24 sts left fold round * sl 1 st wyb p1 * repeat from * to * to end decrease round followed by 2 even rnds 16 sts left of round decrease round followed by 2 even rnds 8 sts left repeat fold round one more time final decrease round * k2tog * repeat from * to * three continue working ribbing for another 5 cm 2 more times there are now 4 sts remaining on the needles body when work measures 12 cm 4 7 from co edge i-cord work a single decrease round so that the hat does work a 4-stitch i-cord for 15 cm 6 leaving a 20 not flare out past the ribbing as follows cm 7 8 tail cut the yarn and thread through the decrease round * k7 k2tog * repeat from * to * to end of live sts to secure round 12 sts decrease d there are now 96 sts remaining on the needles tassel work
